pages.achievement: Stone Age
Pottery
First metal casting
Leather preparation
Bronze Age
Hammer time
Stones, minerals
Clean up with Bronze
Winter is coming
Charcoal pyrolisys
Iron Age
Shiny metal plates
Clean up with Lead
Advanced farming
Hard like steel
Choke with coke
Better Transport
Crucial crucible
Power On
Metal Foundry
Glassworks
Automatic forge
Clean up with Steel
Industry Giant
Efficient Steel Production
Improved Transport
Sparks
Injection Mold
Better tools
Modern Chemistry
Useful gases
More Chemistry
More Energy!
Oxygen Affinity
Advanced Metallurgy
Advanced Circuit
Clean up with Charge

pages.header: You need to make some primitive tools, collect wood and straw, find good place for shelter, try to start fire with sticks and survive first night.

pages.achievement: Grab some stones and sticks, make basic stone tools (knife, axe, shovel)
Cut some trees with axe
Cut some grass with knife
Find pond with drinkable (fresh) water
Find flat terrain near pond, dig trench around and build temporary shelter. Thatch can be used for doors
Make firestarter and try to light fire pit. Put some stick into to get torches
Wait for dawn, make more stone tools

pages.header: You need clay to make containers and molds.

pages.achievement: Explore your shelter neighbouring
Collect any food you spotted (crops, sea weeds)
Kill any large animal (not a sheeps or female cow), fry meat, use raw hide to make temporary bed to set your spawn point
Find some clay deposits (look for Goldenrod flowers)
Memorise any spot, where metal ore are spotted (copper is most valuable now)
Bring clay to shelter, knap it to produce some bowls, vessels and jugs
Dig hole, place your earthenwares (shift+right click), place 8 straw shafts and 8 logs to create pit kiln, start fire.
Explore your neighbouring, collect more clay
Found fruit trees? cut branches and replant near your shelter
Did you seen any copper ore in ravines/mountain walls? Make pickaxe mold. If not, make saw mold
Can you collect 10..20 pieces of copper (or at least 9 copper and 1 cassiterite)? If not, change bowl into gold pan and siewe sand or gravel above flowing water.
10 ore pieces gives you one tool - put it into vessel and use pit kiln again
Pour molten metal into your fired mold
Ready to mine? Bring more copper! No copper visible? Get saw and make timber for sluice

pages.header: You need leather not only for leather armor, but also for bellows

pages.achievement: Find some lime/calcium rocks
Make stone hammer, crush lime rocks into calcite dust, calcinate it in firepit to get quicklime (flux)
Alternatively, if there no lime rock nearby, put twigs into firepit and make base liquor from ashes
Throw raw hides into large vessel (or barrel) full of Limewater or Base Liquor, seal
Put hide into limewater, seal
Throw hide onto horizontal placed log (bark up), use knife to clean each hide piece
Wash hide in water container
Treat hide in tannin container

pages.header: Make prospector pickaxe, to find more ores and minerals

pages.achievement: Explore your neighbouring using prospector pick and memorise map of resources. In case of copper, try to dig first mine
If any chipped jewels found, make alloy calculator and protection range detector
Collected enough copper and other metals? Make other molds and cast copper or bronze to get chisel, axe, mace, scythe
Make some ingot molds
Flux source nearby? If not, make boat and explore another lands
Found some seeds? Prepare farmland near water with hoe, plant these seeds
Prerequisites: chisel and flux
Make stone anvil, put flux and hammer into
Prepare two firepits, two bellows and heaps of logs, alternatively make forge if you have charcoal
Cast 14 copper ingots, try to weld until hot or heat up in firepit/forge
Make first real anvil from 7 double copper ingots
Try to make some copper sheets
Make copper armor or evaporation pan
Weld bronze/rose gold ingots, make better anvil, bronze armor

pages.header: Found better place for your habitat? Want to upgrade your slumsy shelter?

pages.achievement: Explore other lands, seek for kalolinite, graphite, claystone
Collect different types of rocks
Use chisel to make bricks from your favorite type of rocks
Make mortar from limemilk or gypsum plaster and sand
Use bricks and mortar for masonry
Make block of glass from sand heated in firepit (you need more advanced technology to make glass panels)
Start to build forge if not yet ready
Collect olive fruit saplings

pages.header: It is time to stop hiding under your hide

pages.achievement: Kill some white skeletons with mace
Kill some spiders with metal javelin
Draw some feathers from chicken or pheasant
Make fishing rod, bow, arrows, quiver
Kill all zombies
Collect some mushrooms
Replant any berry bushes you found - make berry fields
Make glass bottles using anvil and heated glass and copper tuyere
Start to prepare some awkward and mundane base potions

pages.header: Bright side: food would not decay fast. Dark side: there will be no more food from crops until next summer.

pages.achievement: Mature crops? Collect them and try to replant before autumn
Collect all crops before snowfall
Prepare any alcoholic beverages
Prepare vinegar
Prepare brine
Brine and preserve vegetables in vinegar
In case of hot climate, dry some fruits on drying mat (use glass blocks to protect it from rain)
Use collected grains to tame cow, keep it safe from wolfs (pit surrounded by fences is enough)

pages.header: You need wood. Lot of wood. Make scythe and remove leaves to get some saplings, before you cut a small tree. Try to be not environmental unfriendly

pages.achievement: Grab metal axe and cut many trees
Dig a large pit or build small bunker
Fill your pit/bunker with logs heaps (shift+right click)
Cover your almost all logs, drop torch and cover all
Get charcoal, when smoke is no more percolating outside covered heap
Use forge to heat up ingots and make some bronze tools in anvil
Start to mining iron ore (25 or 35 unit pieces are the best)

pages.header: You need charcoal. Lot of charcoal. And a smithing experience.

pages.achievement: Make bloomery doors from brass
Build bloomery from stone/bricks, install ladder
Put 8 charcoal pieces into bloomery
Climb above bloomery and drop charcoal and ore into
Lit bloomery, if finished, get iron bloom and work on it while hot
Make iron anvil
Make iron grill - can be used for improved firepit or furnace for producing glass and clay bricks
Make iron armor and sword

pages.header: Found any sphalerite? Cast some brass ingots. You need them to make some simple automation mechanisms and steam exosuit.

pages.achievement: Found any kaolinite/graphit? Make automated bellows
Read 'Esteemed Innovation' book
Make boiler, archiedes screw pump and some pipes
Place pump in fresh water facing into boiler side. Connect pipes from boiler to pump, put water and fuel into boiler
Make steam filling pad and connect to boiler
Make exosuit frames
Build Engineering Table
Make hydrophobic boots, install, load steam and enjoy walking on water :)

pages.header: It is time to use some advanced weaponry against unwanted creatures. Dont throw your bow away, it is still usable for hunting, lead bullets give none edible meat.

pages.achievement: Collect or make some gunpowder
Melt some lead ingots into nuggets
Prepare some cartridges
Make flintlock pistol (or musket if you have treated wood)
Kill all skeletons from distance
Dig deep mineshaft, found any slime and convert into grease
Use thumper or steam drill for improvement of mining works
Make raft with paddle or small sailship and launch it

pages.header: You will need large quanitity of wool, plant/olive oil, leather, alcohol.

pages.achievement: Explore new lands, seek for sheeps
Make ropes to capture sheeps, bring them home
Collect all domestic animals and breed them
Cultivate large field of jute plants and olive trees
Collect enough number of berry bushes to gather full stack of berries to make positive effect potions
Increase area of potato or grain cultivation
Prepare fertilizers from rotten meat, straws, ashes and bones
Try to steal industrial hemp seeds from zombie Farmer

pages.header: With use of caolinite and graphite, you can make gray crucible, heart of blast furnace

pages.achievement: Make three crucibles
Use two crucibles to build blast furnace with chimney
Put charcoal, iron ore, flux and lit it, install tuyere, use bellows to increase temperature
Catch liquid pig iron to crucible
Cast pig iron into ingot mold, use anvil to hammer pig irong ingot into steel ingot
Make steel anvil
Prepare some steel tools
Cast steel, nickel and black bronze ingots.

pages.header: With coke oven you can produce not only charcoal or coke, but also byproduct of pyrolisys - creozote oil

pages.achievement: Make Iron Workbench
Make 26 yellow (you need treated wood) or 27 gray (you need steel and Engineer Hammer) coke oven blocks
Build coke oven (3x3x3 multiblock structure, hollow if yellow), gray furnace must be assembled with engineering hammer
Put wood logs and produce fuel for bloomery and blast furnace
Soak timber in creozote, make impregnated planks and sticks
Make brick mold from treated wood (instead of creozote, you can use olive oil)

pages.header: Thanks to the steel and creozote or olive oil impregnants you can establish better transport.

pages.achievement: Cut wood logs into support beams and soak them into creozote oil
Make wooden rails and build first railway line
Make minecart wheels, minecart and construct cargo cart
Make crowbar to attach/detach some carts
With use of steel nails you can construct animal crate
Impregnate oak, spruce, birch, acacia or hickory logs and planks with use of olive oil
Build sail ship. Explore far southern lands and bring some chickens
Serch for quartzite sand for clear glass production

pages.header: You need separate crucible to melt metals and mix them into alloys

pages.achievement: Melt ingredients in crucible, cast weak black steel and forge black steel sheets.
Make black steel anvil
Make improved chests, steel hoppers, minecarts or ship with chest
Proceed with red and blue steel and appropriate anvils
Make your final favorite coloured armour
Make red and blue bucket
Make some refractory containers
Cast some steel units from ingot moulds into refractory containers

pages.header: Time for industrialization - you need energy. You can use external power to cast iron or steel into molds

pages.achievement: Prepare invar and cupronickel ingots with use of Alloy Furnace
Melt tin ingots and fill 4 refractory containers
Build Metal Caster
Make 'Engineer Manual' book and enginner hammer
Build kinetic dynamo
Make water wheel or wind mill wheel, attach to kinetic dynamo, use engineer hammer to change dynamo windings orientation if needed
Use furnace to make gears molds and hardened clay for cable insulators
Connect power source to Metal Caster

pages.header: With powered Metal Caster, you can produce advanced metal components

pages.achievement: Use Alloy Furnace to pour tin into refractory containers
Cast tin into gear bushing mold.
Put tin bushing into second field and cast steel into gear mold.
Now you can make Rolling Machine and hobbyist Steam Machine
Power up Rolling Machine and prepare some iron and steel plates
Place steam boiler at firebox and connect at least two industrial Steam Machines to it.
Now you are ready to provide enough power to heat up Induction Crucible Furnace beyond 2000K

pages.header: Induction Crucible Furnace can melt not only metals and alloys, but also sand, glass and dyes

pages.achievement: Mix quartzite sand and flux, melt it to obtain block or slab of glass
Melt any dye, use Metal Infuser to mix dye and glass
Make coloured glass
Melt pure quartzite sand to obtain very clear quartz glass
Use quartz glass slab to make universal liquid container
Make tin plate for flat glass
Use anvil and hot tin plate to prepare flat glass pane
Use existing flat glass to cast more flat glass

pages.header: Powered metal press can help with forging high carbonised steel ingots into finished ones, or making double ingots, sheets, rods, tuyeres

pages.achievement: Assembly Metal Press in your forge area
Connect power from your steam engines
Throw plate mold into Metal Press and make some steel plates
Make more steel and iron gears
Assembly Industrial Squezeer facility, use it to make steel and iron coils
Prepare iron and steel mechanical components
Forge iron bar and clone it with Foundry

pages.header: Old fashioned flintlock weapons needs to be replaced by modern one

pages.achievement: Make turning table and any kinetic generator
Machine turning blank into revolver drum
Finish drum with use of Iron Workbench
Make Revolver
Make Engineer's Workbench
Test different types of projectiles and send all skeletons back into graveyard
Attach Precision Scope to Revolver
Wear Fall Assist boots and fill your exosuit with steam
Look trough Precision Scope at Enderman

pages.header: It is time to abandon this medieval stuff and shuffle into modern technology

pages.achievement: Prepare place for your industrial plant
Assembly Advanced Blast Furnace (red)
Assembly Crusher, feed it with any iron ore
Place Bessemer Convertor Furnace adjacent to any heat generator
Place Refractory hopper over metal Caster and build 5 block high chimney above it
Make empty steel cells with use of metal former, fill with compressed air
Fill Transfer Ladle with iron ore batch and flux
Meanwhile search for rubber trees

pages.header: You need a lot of steel, but you can make it now faster and throw melted steel directly into Caster

pages.achievement: Insert Transfer Ladle to Advanced Blast Furnace to produce pig iron
Convert pig iron into steel with use of air in Bessemer Convertor Furnace
Place Transfer Ladle at the south edge of the chimney above liquid hopper and break it
Molten steel will sink into Caster and you can cast ingots or other steel products
Make Rolling Machine and Assembly Metal Press for easy production of sheets and structural beams
Assembly Railcraft Blast Furnace (grey) to produce liquid iron

pages.header: With mass steel production you can build up your transport infrastructure

pages.achievement: Use rolling machine to make steel rails
Assembly Tunnel Bore for mining or tunnel constructions
Build faster railway network
Make synthetic blaze powder or seek some fury glimses near lava pods close to earth crust
Build steam locomotive, cargo carts, minecarts with chests, tank carts
Build elevator rail for vertical transport in your mines
Improve your steam exosuit with wings and other powerups

pages.header: With electricity you can achieve high temperatures and pressures

pages.achievement: Make acheson furnace
Squizee some spruce logs, smelt resin into tar
Make some coal electrodes
Produce carborundum dust
Try to convert graphite into another form of carbon
Make electric muffle furnace

pages.header: Complicated metal objects must to be casted into single-use sand molds

pages.achievement: Use iron workbench to make small crucible
Prepare sand mold for bronze tub.
Put bronze ingot into crucible, heat crucible in muffle furnace
Place sand mold at the ground, pour molten bronze from crucible into the mold, wait 10 s and break it
Proceed with casting tiny steel bars, chiesel, hand drill bore and other tools
Cast detonation spraying machine parts and assembly it

pages.header: You need both electric tools and advanced handy warez

pages.achievement: Make electric macerator and compressor
Assembly ore washer near crusher facility
Connect washer and crusher with transmission belts
Use pump and pipes for ore washer water supply
Find some diamonds or make artificial ones
Make diamond dust coated files
Make better version of the loom
Assembly wire mill
Make any kind of mining drill
Assembly both parts of lathe table

pages.header: You need some better equipment than clay vessels

pages.achievement: Make porcelain wares: chemically resitant oven, chimney knee, precipitator/condenser
Read IHL manual and assembly setup for sulfuric acid production
Make stearine from suet
Cast high presure steel vessels and parts of turbocompresor
Make cryogenic distiller
Use cryogenic distiller to fractionate Nitrogen and Oxygen from air
Assembly both parts of wooden rolling machine and make vulcanised rubber rolls
Make fabric from hemp and produce rubber pipe

pages.header: With gas welding station you can quickly produce structural beams or make sofisticated glass equipment

pages.achievement: Make carbide from quicklime and coal dust
Build gas welding station
Put carbide into red bottle together with water, Oxygen into blue one
Place your welding station near iron working bench, now you can proceed with making T or I beams on it
Make glass blowing tube, now you can make glass bottles easy
Make both parts of rolling machine, assembly it - now you can make thin metal foils
Make laboratory electrolyser, produce Hydrogen

pages.header: Once you have advanced tools such welding station or lathe table, you can make use advanced chemistry

pages.achievement: Build chemical reactors and fluidised bed reactors
Produce Ammonia from Hydrogen and Nitrogen
Make setup for efficient fertiliser production
Produce sodium sulfide and make setup for fast paper production
Make electrolysis bath, connect with thick flexible cable to rectifier
Electrolythically deposit nickel at iron casing
Roast sfalerite in sulfuric acid production setup
Get some cadmium as byproduct of electrolytic production of zinc plates

pages.header: You will high amounts of RF or EU energy to power your Industry Park, steam engines are too weak

pages.achievement: Assembly Railcraft Turbine and boiler
Assembly Fermenter, put potato water into to get vodka
Assembly Fractionation Column for ethanol destillation
Assembly Refinery and produce biodiesel from plant oil or olive oil
Find crude oil deposits and produce diesel
Assembly Arc Furnace and connect all three plugs to Turbine
You can now melt metal powders and smelt purified ores, and you are ready to obtain new metals

pages.header: Advanced metals, such like aluminium or chrome, need advanced processing

pages.achievement: Find deposts of bauxite by Propick or Ore Scanner (in claystone rocks) or bauxite veins by Sample Drill
Find deposits of Cryolite or Fluorite
Run sulfuric acid production
Produce Sodium carbonate using either Leblanc or Solway process
Make NaOH from Sodium carbonate and limewater
Use Bayer process to obtain pure aluminium oxide
Use Arc Furnace to proceed with Hall-Heroult electrolysis
Melt Al nuggets and produce ingots and other elements needed for HV infrastructure

pages.header: Once you put your hands on aluminum, you can get more power and mine more resources

pages.achievement: Assembly Diesel Generator, feed it with biodiesel
Make Core Sample Drill and seek valuable veins
Assembly Excavator where vein was found, build HV line or generator for power supply
Search for chromite deposits, or magnetite or garnierite weins, collect serpentine as a byproduct, extract chromite
Proceed chromite in ore washer, reduce in Arc Furnace to get ferrochrome
Melt ferrochrome and iron grit in Arc Furnace to get stainless steel
Dissolve purified copper ore or grit in sulfuric acid and produce refined copper plates

pages.header: Time to extract some very rare but valuable metals

pages.achievement: Collect sludges from copper electrolysis, treat with chlorine in fluidized bed reactor and proceed further for iridium
Process red mud waste from aluminium plant for titanium recovery
Seek for Spodumene Ore, extract lithium and produce lithium oxide for ferrite dust
Seek for Gyubnera Ore, which is source of Tungsten (Wolframe) and Manganese
Seek for source of Antimonium, Boron and Magnesium, make soldering alloy and silicon
Seek for Xenotime deposits and Monazite sand, extract yttrium and neodymium, make artificial redstone

pages.header: Still problems with energy supply? Nuke it

pages.achievement: Make trichlorosilane and deposit it to polysilicon slab
Melt polysilicon in wiremill and pull out silicon crystal
Make memory crystals and advanced circuits
Make hazmat suit, rubber boots and scuba helmet
Process pitchblende to pure uranium tetrafluoride
Make Thermal Centrifuge
Build nuclear reactor and appropriate heat exchange systems and turbines
Prepare nuclear fuel
Insert fuel rods in nuclear reactor and enjoy your setup from safe distance

pages.header: Finally, you are able to kill this poor bear with one clear shoot

pages.achievement: Make Railgun
Make HV capacitors and Charging Station
Upgrade your Railgun
Install airborne extensions in your steam exosuit
Send all Endermans to The End
Use wailer remains to make throne from your enemy bones
